title: Magnus Walker's Next Big Thing
description:
Magnus Walker rose to automotive fame after the video "Urban Outlaw" went viral. He's a staple in the community and has a new show on HAGERTY called, "The Big Thing with Magnus Walker", where he takes you for a ride in icons like the Mercedes 300SL, Ford GT (all 3 generations!), Porsche 930, and more.

We get a behind-the-scenes look at the making of the show, talk about his time with the Maserati MC12, Ford GTs, what he likes about Ferrari (and doesn't), how his cars are, and what's next for the show.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mqVwMQMAEEY

Recorded Feb. 17, 2022

 

Want to find the right parts for you car? Head to https://carparts.com/thesmokingtire and get 10% off a purchase of $100 or more.

Go to blackvue.com/TST and use the promo code TIRE to get 10% off of any BlackVue dash cam. Free shipping for orders over $200.

author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
